Package j8spec

Core J8Spec classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DescribeBlock
    Representation of a "describe" block.
    ItBlock
    Representation of a "it" block ready to be executed.
    ItBlockConfiguration
    Represents a "it" block configuration.
    J8Spec
    J8Spec main facade.
    Var<T>
    Wrapper object to allow "final" variables to have their value modified.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BlockAlreadyDefinedException
    Thrown when a block with the same description has already been defined in the same context.
    CIModeEnabledException
    Thrown when a method that ignores or focuses a block (like xit or fit) is used while the system property j8spec.ci.mode is true.
    IllegalContextException
    Thrown when a block definition method is called outside the context of the J8Spec.read(Class) method.
    J8SpecException
    J8Spec root exception.
    SpecInitializationException
    Thrown when an instance of the class that contains the spec definition cannot be instantiated.

Package j8spec Description

Core J8Spec classes.
